text:
Hey all, Developer Day 2021 is coming up fast.

Details and registration at the link.
<https://events.HubSpot.com/events/details/HubSpot-HubSpot-global-presents-developer-day-2021/|https://events.HubSpot.com/events/details/HubSpot-HubSpot-global-presents-developer-day-2021/>

In the meantime tomorrow is the start of INBOUND. Join us in the <#C01BBPNJ25A|inbound-conference> channel to chat about it.
